name: Genesis Engineering Services
overview: Genesis Engineering Services provides the ability for sales forces around the world to have access to demonstration and evaluation equipment for potential customers. The company provides organizations the capability to control their assets, costs and prevent leakage by tracking and recovering equipment after a loan period. Services include asset management and recovery, order fulfillment, configuration, technical support and testing, customer relationship and logistics management. With operations in the US and in the Netherlands Genesis can provide service globally, no matter where your sales force or potential customers are located. Some of Genesis clients include Cisco Systems, Elo Touch Solutions and Aurora Networks.
